panels.description: Current status of worker nodes based on node-resource-exporter. Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Worker Node Status

panels.description: Number of pods currently in Pending state without a node assigned. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Unscheduled Pods

panels.description: Scheduler throughput based on successful operations per second. Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec. Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (count metric as proxy). YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec. Higher is better.

targets.expr:
# Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec
(sum(rate(kueue_admitted_workloads_total{cluster_queue!=""}[5m])))
OR
# Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (proxy)
(sum(rate(volcano_task_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_count[5m])))
OR
# YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec
(sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state="allocated"}[5m])))
OR
# Default to 0 if no scheduler metrics found
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Success Rate (ops/s)

panels.description: Rate of failed/rejected scheduling/admission attempts per second. Kueue: Inadmissible attempts. Volcano: Job retries (proxy). YuniKorn: Rejected/Error attempts.

targets.expr:
# Kueue: Inadmissible attempts/sec
(sum(rate(kueue_admission_attempts_total{result="inadmissible"}[5m])))
OR
# Volcano: Job retries/sec (proxy for issues)
(sum(rate(volcano_job_retry_counts[5m])))
OR
# YuniKorn: Rejected/Error attempts/sec
(sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state=~"rejected|error"}[5m])))
OR
# Default to 0
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Failure/Retry Rate (ops/s)
Job Wait Time (Min/Avg/Max per Namespace)
panels.description: Minimum, Average, and Maximum job wait time (Created to Start) per namespace, based on unified exporter gauge metric.

panels.title: Job Execution Time (Min/Avg/Max per Namespace)
panels.description: Minimum, Average, and Maximum job execution time (Start to Completion) for Succeeded/Failed jobs per namespace, based on unified exporter gauge metric.

panels.title: Job Total Time (Min/Avg/Max per Namespace)
panels.description: Minimum, Average, and Maximum job total time (Created to Completion) for Succeeded/Failed jobs per namespace, based on unified exporter gauge metric.

panels.title: Job Phases (Phase per Namespace)
panels.description: Number of Jobs (K8s & Volcano) in different states based on unified exporter metrics (filtered by job namespace and kind). Uses numeric phase mapping.

panels.title: Job Event Timestamps (First/Last per Namespace)
panels.description: Timestamp of the first/last job start and completion (Succeeded or Failed) within the selected time range, grouped by namespace. Uses unified exporter gauge metrics. Timestamps converted and formatted.
Total number of Pods in each phase over time based on KSM metrics (filtered by namespace). Provides a view of system throughput and potential bottlenecks (e.g., high Pending count).
panels.title: Pod Phases (Phase per Namespace)
Pod Event Timestamps (First/Last per Namespace)
panels.description: Timestamp of the first/last pod start and completion (based on KSM metrics) within the selected time range, grouped by namespace. Timestamps converted and formatted.

matcher.options: Total Span (Last Pod Completion - First Pod Start) (s)

renameByName.Pod Total Span (s): Total Span (Last Pod Completion - First Pod Start) (s)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Wait Duration (Created to Start) based on unified exporter histogram, grouped by namespace and kind.
panels.title: Job Wait Duration (Histogram)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Execution Duration (Start to Completion) based on unified exporter histogram, grouped by namespace and status. Includes Succeeded and Failed jobs.
panels.title: Job Execution Duration (Histogram)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Total Duration (Created to Completion) based on unified exporter histogram, grouped by namespace and status. Includes Succeeded and Failed jobs.
panels.title: Job Total Duration (Histogram)
Job Concurrency by Phase
panels.description: Number of jobs (K8s & Volcano) currently in each phase, stacked. Based on unified exporter metric 'unified_job_concurrency_count'.

panels.title: Job Concurrency by Queue
panels.description: Number of jobs (K8s & Volcano) currently active per queue, stacked. Based on unified exporter metric 'unified_job_concurrency_count'.

Simulated resource usage (pod requests) over time in absolute values (excludes control plane). Shows actual CPU cores, memory bytes, and GPU counts requested across all pods. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Total Simulated Usage Over Time (Absolute)

panels.description: Simulated resource usage (pod requests) over time as a percentage of total allocatable resources (excludes control plane). Shows dynamic changes in cluster resource allocation percentage. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Total Simulated Usage Over Time (%)

panels.description: Number of Pods scheduled on each worker node over time (excludes control plane). Helps identify load balancing and saturation patterns. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Jobs Pod Distribution per Node
Selected Nodes CPU Usage (Absolute) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated CPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Selected Nodes Memory Usage (Absolute) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated Memory usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Selected Nodes GPU Usage (Absolute) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated GPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter. Will show 0 if no GPUs requested or available.

panels.title: Selected Nodes CPU Usage (%) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated CPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of allocatable CPU across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Selected Nodes Memory Usage (%) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated Memory usage (pod requests) as a percentage of allocatable Memory across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Selected Nodes GPU Usage (%) (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated GPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of allocatable GPUs across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter. Will show 0% if no GPUs requested or allocatable.
Node CPU simulated usage (sum of requests) in absolute cores. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Per Node CPU Usage (Absolute)

panels.description: Node Memory simulated usage (sum of requests) in absolute bytes. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Per Node Memory Usage (Absolute)

panels.description: Node GPU simulated usage (sum of requests) in absolute count. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane. Shows 0 if no GPUs.
panels.title: Per Node GPU Usage (Absolute)

panels.description: Node CPU simulated usage (sum of requests) as a percentage of allocatable CPU over time. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Per Node CPU Usage (%)

panels.description: Node Memory simulated usage (sum of requests) as a percentage of allocatable Memory over time. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Per Node Memory Usage (%)

panels.description: Node GPU simulated usage (sum of requests) as a percentage of allocatable GPUs over time. Filtered by selected nodes (use $node variable). Excludes control plane. Shows 0% if no GPUs allocatable.
panels.title: Per Node GPU Usage (%)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated CPU/Memory utilization percentage across nodes (excludes control plane). Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing.
panels.title: Node Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated GPU utilization percentage across nodes (excludes control plane). Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing. Shows 0 if no GPUs.
panels.title: Node GPU Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Average actual CPU cores used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. Based on cAdvisor metrics.
panels.title: Scheduler CPU Usage

panels.description: Current Memory Working Set used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. Based on cAdvisor metrics.
panels.title: Scheduler Memory Usage

panels.description: Actual CPU usage (cores) for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns. Based on cAdvisor.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Actual Memory Working Set for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns. Based on cAdvisor.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod Memory Usage

list.description: Select namespace(s) where benchmark jobs/pods run.
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Select the active scheduler to display its specific metrics.
list.label: Scheduler
list.name: scheduler

list.description: Select node(s) to filter node-specific views (excludes control-plane by default)
list.label: Node
list.name: node
